sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function CartItem({item, value}) { const {id, title, img, price, total, count} = item; const {increment, decrement, removeFromCart} = value; return (
product: {title}
price: {price}
decrement(id)}> -
{count}
increment(id)}> +
{/* */}
icon
total: ${total}
) }
